till a lot later, huh, Darla?

248
00:25:23,135 --> 00:25:27,162
She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

249
00:25:27,239 --> 00:25:29,571
l don't have any dolls.

250
00:25:29,642 --> 00:25:33,009
Get some food, huh?

251
00:25:33,079 --> 00:25:36,071
Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

252
00:25:41,754 --> 00:25:45,451
- ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]

253
00:25:55,468 --> 00:25:58,699
Thirty, forty dollars.

254
00:26:00,473 --> 00:26:02,907
Who the fuck is this now?

255
00:26:02,975 --> 00:26:07,139
Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

256
00:26:07,213 --> 00:26:09,875
- Cerrado!
- [ Pounding ]

257
00:26:09,949 --> 00:26:13,783
Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

258
00:26:19,291 --> 00:26:21,316
[ Muttering ]

259
00:26:21,393 --> 00:26:25,659
Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

260
00:26:27,366 --> 00:26:29,095
Hey! Hey!

261
00:26:31,137 --> 00:26:33,230
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Screams ]

262
00:26:33,305 --> 00:26:37,674
''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

263
00:26:37,743 --> 00:26:41,679
gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

264
00:26:43,649 --> 00:26:45,947
What are you talking about?

265
00:26:46,018 --> 00:26:48,748
You heard me rapping, right?

266
00:26:48,821 --> 00:26:52,951
You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

267
00:26:55,361 --> 00:26:58,353
l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

268
00:26:58,430 --> 00:26:59,795
Gold.

269
00:26:59,865 --> 00:27:02,197
You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

270
00:27:06,472 --> 00:27:11,603
Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

271
00:27:11,677 --> 00:27:14,202
Shit on me.
Shit on me!

272
00:27:20,352 --> 00:27:22,616
- Aaah!
- Mr. Gideon.

273
00:27:22,688 --> 00:27:24,952
You're not paying attention.

274
00:27:27,860 --> 00:27:30,021
No! [ Screaming ]

275
00:27:30,095 --> 00:27:35,397
l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

276
00:27:37,036 --> 00:27:40,494
lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

277
00:27:43,209 --> 00:27:46,872
He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

278
00:27:46,946 --> 00:27:50,109
[ Helicopter Departing ]

279
00:27:52,184 --> 00:27:54,175
Who's this sack of shit?

280
00:27:54,253 --> 00:27:57,222
That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

281
00:27:57,289 --> 00:28:00,349
l think you can rule out
accidental death.

282
00:28:00,426 --> 00:28:03,224
Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

283
00:28:03,295 --> 00:28:07,459
This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

284
00:28:07,533 --> 00:28:12,266
Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

285
00:28:12,338 --> 00:28:14,272
l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

286
00:28:14,340 --> 00:28:18,106
Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

287
00:28:19,311 --> 00:28:21,711
What the hell
do you call that?

288
00:28:22,781 --> 00:28:25,375
l call it blood, detective.

289
00:28:25,451 --> 00:28:29,217
l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

290
00:28:29,288 --> 00:28:32,052
You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

291
00:28:32,124 --> 00:28:36,117
[ Helicopter Approaching ]

292
00:28:38,799 --> 00:28:41,700
- Warmer?
- What are you doing?

293
00:28:41,769 --> 00:28:44,397
- Don't you know this game?
- What game?

294
00:28:44,472 --> 00:28:47,373
Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

295
00:28:47,441 --> 00:28:51,844
They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

296
00:28:51,913 --> 00:28:57,442
Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

297
00:29:01,022 --> 00:29:03,616
- Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

298
00:29:12,767 --> 00:29:14,792
No, no.

299
00:29:14,869 --> 00:29:17,997
No, no, no.

300
00:29:20,474 --> 00:29:24,706
Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

301
00:29:28,616 --> 00:29:30,982
Shelly.

302
00:29:39,160 --> 00:29:40,559
l love you.

303
00:29:45,633 --> 00:29:48,500
[ Groaning ]

304
00:29:48,569 --> 00:29:51,504
- You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

305
00:29:51,572 --> 00:29:54,666
- Thank you.
- Take anything!

306
00:29:54,742 --> 00:29:57,609
Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

307
00:29:57,678 --> 00:30:00,306
the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

308
00:30:00,381 --> 00:30:02,781
The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

309
00:30:02,850 --> 00:30:07,947
T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

310
00:30:08,022 --> 00:30:11,014
- Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

311
00:30:11,092 --> 00:30:14,858
- A whole jolly club...
- Please!

312
00:30:14,929 --> 00:30:17,693
- with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

313
00:30:17,765 --> 00:30:20,427
- Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!

314
00:30:22,103 --> 00:30:25,504
Each one of these is a life...

315
00:30:25,573 --> 00:30:28,098
a life you helped destroy.

316
00:30:28,175 --> 00:30:30,769
l'm begging you.
Don't kill me.

317
00:30:30,845 --> 00:30:34,542
l'm not gonna kill you.

318
00:30:34,615 --> 00:30:38,779
Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

319
00:30:38,853 --> 00:30:42,380
tonight.

320
00:30:47,428 --> 00:30:51,626
Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

321
00:30:53,534 --> 00:30:57,595
You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

322
00:30:57,671 --> 00:31:01,300
You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

323
00:31:01,375 --> 00:31:03,536
ls that gasoline l smell?

324
00:31:03,611 --> 00:31:06,546
No, man, no!
No!

325
00:31:06,614 --> 00:31:08,673
No!

326
00:31:08,749 --> 00:31:10,080
No!

327
00:31:13,120 --> 00:31:15,748
[ Screaming ]

328
00:31:19,060 --> 00:31:23,929
[ Screaming ]

329
00:31:25,766 --> 00:31:29,224
lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

330
00:31:29,303 --> 00:31:31,567
One root beer.

331
00:31:33,607 --> 00:31:36,337
[ Bartender ] l can't do anything.

332
00:31:36,410 --> 00:31:40,870
Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

333
00:31:40,948 --> 00:31:43,075
Yeah, way off.

334
00:31:44,251 --> 00:31:47,618
[ Tires Screeching, Door Opening ]

335
00:31:47,688 --> 00:31:52,591
Police! Don't move!
l said, ''Don't move!''

336
00:31:52,660 --> 00:31:55,686
l thought the police
always said, ''Freeze!''

337
00:31:55,763 --> 00:31:59,699
l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.

338
00:31:59,767 --> 00:32:04,932
And l say l'm dead and l move.

339
00:32:05,005 --> 00:32:08,304
Not one more step.
l'm serious.

340
00:32:08,375 --> 00:32:12,744
Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

341
00:32:12,813 --> 00:32:15,941
What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

342
00:32:16,016 --> 00:32:17,745
You high?

343
00:32:17,818 --> 00:32:21,015
- You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

344
00:32:21,088 --> 00:32:25,081
How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

345
00:32:25,159 --> 00:32:27,821
Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

346
00:32:27,895 --> 00:32:32,491
l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

347
00:32:32,566 --> 00:32:37,401
Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

348
00:32:37,471 --> 00:32:41,931
- lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.

349
00:32:42,009 --> 00:32:44,443
Do you know someone named T-bird?

350
00:32:44,512 --> 00:32:49,108
He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

351
00:32:49,183 --> 00:32:51,777
You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

352
00:32:51,852 --> 00:32:55,344
- [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

353
00:32:55,422 --> 00:33:00,792
- [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

354
00:33:00,861 --> 00:33:04,524
They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

355
00:33:04,598 --> 00:33:07,032
Get away from there!

356
00:33:07,101 --> 00:33:10,229
Cops!
Get outta here!

357
00:33:10,304 --> 00:33:13,705
- [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

358
00:33:19,079 --> 00:33:23,413
- Oh, great, great.
- [ Siren Wailing ]

359
00:33:23,484 --> 00:33:26,078
Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

360
00:33:26,153 --> 00:33:28,485
and you lose him
right out in the open.

361
00:33:28,556 --> 00:33:34,392
Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

362
00:33:34,461 --> 00:33:38,397
Little early
for Devil's Night.

363
00:33:39,967 --> 00:33:42,697
You are very restless.

364
00:33:42,770 --> 00:33:46,001
Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

365
00:33:46,073 --> 00:33:50,305
- Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

366
00:33:53,914 --> 00:33:56,508
[ Sizzling ]

367
00:33:56,584 --> 00:34:00,179
** [ Rock And Roll, lndistinct ]

368
00:34:01,789 --> 00:34:04,815
There are energies
aligning against you.

369
00:34:04,892 --> 00:34:07,360
Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

370
00:34:14,301 --> 00:34:18,101
[ Door Opening, Closing ]

371
00:34:18,172 --> 00:34:21,164
Mmm, yummy.

372
00:34:26,513 --> 00:34:30,472
Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

373
00:34:30,551 --> 00:34:33,782
Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

374
00:34:33,854 --> 00:34:35,617
l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

375
00:34:35,689 --> 00:34:38,351
[ Man ] You must be
awfully disappointed.

376
00:34:38,425 --> 00:34:41,758
l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

377
00:34:41,829 --> 00:34:44,127
- Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

378
00:34:44,198 --> 00:34:48,760
Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

379
00:34:48,836 --> 00:34:51,396
Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

380
00:34:51,472 --> 00:34:54,669
an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

381
00:34:57,344 --> 00:34:59,904
You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

382
00:34:59,980 --> 00:35:02,778
- Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

383
00:35:02,850 --> 00:35:05,648
That's very reassuring.

384
00:35:05,719 --> 00:35:09,746
l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

385
00:35:09,823 --> 00:35:14,283
ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?

386
00:35:14,361 --> 00:35:16,226
Call it my need to know.

387
00:35:43,157 --> 00:35:45,022
[ Sighing ]

388
00:35:47,227 --> 00:35:49,752
[ Honking, Tires Screeching ]

389
00:35:49,830 --> 00:35:52,424
Let go, you creep!

390
00:35:55,736 --> 00:35:57,499
- Nah.
- [ Laughing ]

391
00:35:57,571 --> 00:36:00,870
You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

392
00:36:02,276 --> 00:36:04,676
He couldn't have stopped.

393
00:36:04,745 --> 00:36:09,045
He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

394
00:36:09,116 --> 00:36:12,176
What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

395
00:36:12,252 --> 00:36:14,243
Sometimes.

396
00:36:16,323 --> 00:36:21,056
lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

397
00:36:22,229 --> 00:36:25,721
- lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

398
00:36:35,056 --> 00:36:38,184
[ Phone Ringing ]

399
00:36:42,664 --> 00:36:47,260
Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

400
00:36:47,335 --> 00:36:51,669
Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

401
00:36:51,740 --> 00:36:55,176
Annie... look at that.

402
00:36:55,243 --> 00:36:59,475
''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

403
00:36:59,548 --> 00:37:01,607
What is this, a petition?

404
00:37:01,683 --> 00:37:04,550
Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

405
00:37:04,619 --> 00:37:08,715
- The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

406
00:37:08,790 --> 00:37:14,695
Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

407
00:37:14,763 --> 00:37:18,324
The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

408
00:37:18,400 --> 00:37:22,393
- l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

409
00:37:29,411 --> 00:37:33,142
You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

410
00:37:33,215 --> 00:37:35,342
l'm cool.

411
00:37:35,417 --> 00:37:40,150
You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

412
00:37:40,222 --> 00:37:42,713
Ah, l owe you one!

413
00:37:42,791 --> 00:37:44,816
Yeah, right.

414
00:37:44,893 --> 00:37:47,054
Damn.

415
00:38:00,642 --> 00:38:04,100
** [ Rock And Roll ]

416
00:38:12,487 --> 00:38:16,355
Tomorrow night
we can get high...

417
00:38:16,424 --> 00:38:20,121
and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

418
00:38:22,964 --> 00:38:26,092
- * l am the park *
- [ Caws ]

419
00:38:26,167 --> 00:38:29,796
* l am glow *

420
00:38:29,871 --> 00:38:33,932
* ln the motherfuckin' dark *

421
00:38:34,009 --> 00:38:36,170
* l am shocked *

422
00:38:36,244 --> 00:38:38,474
* And l see *

423
00:38:38,546 --> 00:38:41,709
* l don't want to believe *

424
00:38:41,783 --> 00:38:44,911
* No more *

425
00:38:44,986 --> 00:38:47,614
- There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

426
00:38:47,689 --> 00:38:49,657
- Huh?
- [ Cawing ]

427
00:38:50,825 --> 00:38:53,726
- lt's a squab.
- [ Laughing ]

428
00:38:53,795 --> 00:38:56,423
Come here, bird.

429
00:38:56,498 --> 00:38:58,591
Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.

430
00:38:58,667 --> 00:39:00,999
Bird. B-B-Birdie.

431
00:39:01,069 --> 00:39:03,663
Here, birdie, birdie.

432
00:39:03,738 --> 00:39:06,730
Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.

433
00:39:09,344 --> 00:39:12,575
Birdie? Hey, birdie?

434
00:39:12,647 --> 00:39:15,241
Here, Funboy.

435
00:39:17,552 --> 00:39:19,520
What the fuck?

436
00:39:23,325 --> 00:39:25,850
[ Strumming Guitar ]

437
00:39:25,927 --> 00:39:30,455
No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

438
00:39:30,532 --> 00:39:32,693
Look at him.

439
00:39:32,767 --> 00:39:35,634
[ Funboy ] Don't sweat it.

440
00:39:37,339 --> 00:39:40,365
lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

441
00:39:48,283 --> 00:39:53,118
Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

442
00:39:55,123 --> 00:40:00,060
You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?

443
00:40:00,128 --> 00:40:03,655
You need professional help.

444
00:40:05,433 --> 00:40:08,027
- [ Groaning ]
- Bingo!

445
00:40:08,103 --> 00:40:10,731
He shoots! He scores!

446
00:40:12,907 --> 00:40:15,899
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Laughing ]

447
00:40:17,245 --> 00:40:20,806
[ Cheering, Laughing ]

448
00:40:20,882 --> 00:40:24,579
- Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?

449
00:40:24,652 --> 00:40:27,382
Stop me if you heard this one.

450
00:40:27,455 --> 00:40:30,390
Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

451
00:40:30,458 --> 00:40:32,392
[ Whimpering ]

452
00:40:32,460 --> 00:40:34,257
Ow.

453
00:40:35,797 --> 00:40:38,561
He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...

454
00:40:38,633 --> 00:40:42,194
Don't you ever fuckin' die?

455
00:40:42,270 --> 00:40:44,500
''Can you put me up for the night?''

456
00:40:44,572 --> 00:40:48,064
[ Groaning ]

457
00:40:50,011 --> 00:40:54,607
- Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

458
00:40:54,682 --> 00:40:56,741
Oh, God.

459
00:40:56,818 --> 00:41:00,914
Look what you've done
to my sheets.

460
00:41:02,824 --> 00:41:04,451
[ Gun Uncocking ]

461
00:41:10,865 --> 00:41:12,628
[ Crying ]

462
00:41:12,700 --> 00:41:16,261
[ Sobbing ]

463
00:41:25,146 --> 00:41:27,114
l've got a gun
in my pocket.

464
00:41:30,151 --> 00:41:32,881
You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

465
00:41:50,638 --> 00:41:54,506
Stay away!
Stay away from me!

466
00:41:55,977 --> 00:41:58,241
[ Screaming ]

467
00:42:02,383 --> 00:42:06,183
Look.

468
00:42:06,254 --> 00:42:10,748
Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

469
00:42:10,825 --> 00:42:15,592
Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

470
00:42:26,003 --> 00:42:30,804
Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

471
00:43:00,571 --> 00:43:04,234
lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!

472
00:43:04,308 --> 00:43:06,572
Now fill it up!

473
00:43:07,678 --> 00:43:11,045
Fill it up yourself, macho man.

474
00:43:11,115 --> 00:43:13,811
l really need this.

475
00:43:20,358 --> 00:43:22,326
All right.

476
00:43:22,393 --> 00:43:26,329
You burn yourself
playing with matches?

477
00:43:26,397 --> 00:43:28,991
- Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

478
00:43:29,066 --> 00:43:31,534
- Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

479
00:43:31,602 --> 00:43:34,537
This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

480
00:43:34,605 --> 00:43:37,403
Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

481
00:43:37,475 --> 00:43:40,911
Oh! Hey, hey, hon!

482
00:43:40,978 --> 00:43:43,879
Hey, good night, Darla.

483
00:43:46,317 --> 00:43:50,014
- You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

484
00:43:58,095 --> 00:44:01,553
Get away, steamhead.

485
00:44:18,115 --> 00:44:20,709
[ Groaning ]

486
00:44:20,785 --> 00:44:22,753
Shh.

487
00:44:32,697 --> 00:44:38,431
[ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

488
00:44:38,502 --> 00:44:41,232
- [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

489
00:44:41,305 --> 00:44:44,297
lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

490
00:44:44,375 --> 00:44:47,310
across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

491
00:44:47,378 --> 00:44:49,539
The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

492
00:44:49,614 --> 00:44:51,741
but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

493
00:44:51,816 --> 00:44:56,583
ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--

494
00:44:56,654 --> 00:44:59,589
Freeze!

495
00:44:59,657 --> 00:45:03,149
Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

496
00:45:03,227 --> 00:45:05,195
[ Whispering ] Fuck.

497
00:45:07,164 --> 00:45:09,359
Good likeness.

498
00:45:09,433 --> 00:45:13,130
l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.

499
00:45:13,204 --> 00:45:15,468
You still have your hat on.

500
00:45:19,377 --> 00:45:21,470
l gotta sit down.

501
00:45:22,279 --> 00:45:24,213
Shi--

502
00:45:24,281 --> 00:45:27,148
[ Albrecht ] Holy Shit.

503
00:45:28,586 --> 00:45:31,248
Say...

504
00:45:31,322 --> 00:45:35,622
are you some kind of... ghost?

505
00:45:35,693 --> 00:45:37,661
Boo!

506
00:45:45,236 --> 00:45:49,798
l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

507
00:45:51,809 --> 00:45:55,870
You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.

508
00:45:55,946 --> 00:45:59,040
She, ah, was beaten and raped.

509
00:45:59,116 --> 00:46:03,712
Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

510
00:46:03,788 --> 00:46:06,416
Come on. Read the file.

511
00:46:06,490 --> 00:46:10,859
Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

512
00:46:10,928 --> 00:46:14,125
Her body finally just gave it up.

513
00:46:14,198 --> 00:46:18,066
l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

514
00:46:27,945 --> 00:46:29,879
- Hey.
- Don't touch me!

515
00:46:29,947 --> 00:46:33,940
- [ Sobbing ]
- Hey.

516
00:46:35,352 --> 00:46:38,185
You okay?

517
00:46:38,255 --> 00:46:40,951
l saw her.

518
00:46:42,593 --> 00:46:45,892
l saw her
through your eyes.

519
00:46:45,963 --> 00:46:48,056
You stayed with her
the whole time.

520
00:46:48,132 --> 00:46:53,593
Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

521
00:46:53,671 --> 00:46:58,404
l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

522
00:46:58,476 --> 00:47:01,411
Give me something
l could work with.

523
00:47:01,479 --> 00:47:03,709
Yeah.

524
00:47:03,781 --> 00:47:06,215
Look, l--

525
00:47:06,283 --> 00:47:08,774
Why didn't you do
something about it?

526
00:47:08,853 --> 00:47:12,186
You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

527
00:47:12,256 --> 00:47:15,714
would talk after
what happened to you?

528
00:47:15,793 --> 00:47:19,024
l kept asking
questions and...

529
00:47:19,096 --> 00:47:21,758
finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

530
00:47:25,770 --> 00:47:27,738
This your wife?

531
00:47:27,805 --> 00:47:32,299
Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

532
00:47:34,145 --> 00:47:37,114
lt's funny.

533
00:47:37,181 --> 00:47:41,174
Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

534
00:47:41,252 --> 00:47:44,744
l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

535
00:47:44,822 --> 00:47:47,848
Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

536
00:47:57,468 --> 00:48:01,928
You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

537
00:48:06,610 --> 00:48:09,807
You going to vanish
into thin air again?

538
00:48:13,450 --> 00:48:16,146
l thought l'd use
your front door.

539
00:48:19,190 --> 00:48:25,026
Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

540
00:48:26,564 --> 00:48:28,896
Yeah.

541
00:48:33,437 --> 00:48:36,031
- [ Door Opening, Closing ]
- [ Whispering ] Yeah.

542
00:48:36,106 --> 00:48:39,633
[ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

543
00:48:39,710 --> 00:48:42,838
l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

544
00:48:42,913 --> 00:48:45,973
And then my business
gets blown up real good.

545
00:48:46,050 --> 00:48:49,281
- Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

546
00:48:49,353 --> 00:48:51,878
l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

547
00:48:51,956 --> 00:48:56,393
He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

548
00:48:56,460 --> 00:49:01,488
He winked at ya?
Musicians.

549
00:49:01,565 --> 00:49:04,033
- What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

550
00:49:04,101 --> 00:49:06,592
shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

551
00:49:06,670 --> 00:49:12,199
What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

552
00:49:12,276 --> 00:49:15,040
You ain't lost everything.

553
00:49:15,112 --> 00:49:20,209
Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

554
00:49:20,284 --> 00:49:23,879
Fair enough. Catch.

555
00:49:24,989 --> 00:49:27,423
Aah! Jesus.

556
00:49:27,491 --> 00:49:29,925
Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

557
00:49:29,994 --> 00:49:31,985
What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

558
00:49:32,062 --> 00:49:35,725
All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

559
00:49:35,799 --> 00:49:39,758
Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

560
00:49:39,837 --> 00:49:43,967
You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

561
00:49:44,041 --> 00:49:46,703
Yeah.

562
00:49:46,777 --> 00:49:51,942
Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

563
00:49:52,016 --> 00:49:55,281
Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

564
00:49:55,352 --> 00:49:58,685
My father's daughter.
That's right.

565
00:49:58,756 --> 00:50:01,953
What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

566
00:50:02,026 --> 00:50:04,290
Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

567
00:50:04,361 --> 00:50:07,856
With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

568
00:50:07,989 --> 00:50:11,447
He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

569
00:50:11,526 --> 00:50:14,927
He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

570
00:50:14,996 --> 00:50:17,226
Whatever the fuck that means.

571
00:50:17,299 --> 00:50:21,065
Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

572
00:50:22,170 --> 00:50:24,229
Want to relax
that thing now?

573
00:50:24,306 --> 00:50:28,970
This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

574
00:50:29,044 --> 00:50:33,413
You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?

575
00:50:33,482 --> 00:50:36,178
l ain't makin' all this up.

576
00:50:36,251 --> 00:50:40,779
l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

577
00:50:42,557 --> 00:50:44,684
All right.

578
00:50:49,331 --> 00:50:54,359
A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

579
00:50:54,436 --> 00:50:58,099
Yeah. [ Laughing ]

580
00:51:04,613 --> 00:51:07,605
For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

581
00:51:14,556 --> 00:51:16,854
Thanks.

582
00:51:16,925 --> 00:51:19,223
Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

583
00:51:19,294 --> 00:51:21,888
A big one.

584
00:51:21,963 --> 00:51:26,832
Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

585
00:51:26,902 --> 00:51:30,838
l'll have the janitor
come on up.

586
00:51:35,277 --> 00:51:37,438
[ Purring ]

587
00:51:37,512 --> 00:51:42,415
** [ Electric Guitar ]

588
00:51:53,895 --> 00:51:57,695
[ Siren Wailing ]

589
00:52:26,928 --> 00:52:32,525
- ** [ Rock Playing ]
- [ Crow Caws ]

590
00:52:32,601 --> 00:52:34,865
You again.

591
00:52:34,936 --> 00:52:37,302
You lost or hungry?

592
00:52:37,372 --> 00:52:40,170
- Hi.
- [ Caws ]

593
00:52:42,510 --> 00:52:44,444
* lt can't rain all the time *

594
00:52:44,512 --> 00:52:49,040
[ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

595
00:52:58,126 --> 00:53:00,822
[ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!

596
00:53:00,895 --> 00:53:03,830
One part falls, it all falls!

597
00:53:03,898 --> 00:53:07,356
- You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

598
00:53:07,435 --> 00:53:09,995
That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

599
00:53:10,071 --> 00:53:12,164
Tin Tin was a dick.

600
00:53:12,240 --> 00:53:15,232
Tin Tin.
Sheesh.

601
00:53:15,310 --> 00:53:19,508
Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

602
00:53:19,581 --> 00:53:21,515
Fire it up!

603
00:53:24,085 --> 00:53:26,178
No Funboy.

604
00:53:26,254 --> 00:53:30,190
Probably still...
bangin' away on Darla.

605
00:53:30,258 --> 00:53:33,193
- [ Grunting ]
- [ Whistles ]

606
00:53:35,563 --> 00:53:38,657
Smokes and road beers.
Be quick.

607
00:53:38,733 --> 00:53:40,724
l'm on it.

608
00:53:46,308 --> 00:53:51,610
[ Man Talking On Phone ]

609
00:53:51,680 --> 00:53:54,649
[ Sighs ]

610
00:53:58,853 --> 00:54:01,287
[ Cawing ]

611
00:54:11,399 --> 00:54:14,960
What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

612
00:54:15,036 --> 00:54:19,666
- [ Cawing ]
- l'm your passenger.

613
00:54:26,581 --> 00:54:28,708
Drive.

614
00:54:30,819 --> 00:54:33,754
[ Motor Starts ]

615
00:54:33,822 --> 00:54:35,619
What's all this
happy horseshit?

616
00:54:35,690 --> 00:54:37,817
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Hey, T-bird! T-bird!

617
00:54:37,892 --> 00:54:41,157
- [ Horn Honking ]
- [ Screams ]

618
00:54:41,229 --> 00:54:43,163
[ Brakes Screeching ]

619
00:54:43,231 --> 00:54:46,496
- Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

620
00:54:46,568 --> 00:54:50,561
Stupid asshair!
You hit my car!

621
00:54:50,638 --> 00:54:52,868
[ Groaning ]

622
00:54:57,545 --> 00:55:01,982
What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

623
00:55:03,585 --> 00:55:06,486
We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

624
00:55:06,554 --> 00:55:09,648
- This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

625
00:55:12,594 --> 00:55:16,792
You got that cream stuff?

626
00:55:16,865 --> 00:55:19,265
l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

627
00:55:20,869 --> 00:55:23,838
- What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

628
00:55:23,905 --> 00:55:26,100
[ Screaming ]

629
00:55:27,342 --> 00:55:30,175
Oh, look. Makin' us popular.

630
00:55:30,245 --> 00:55:32,941
When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

631
00:55:33,014 --> 00:55:38,452
[ Siren Wailing ]

632
00:55:38,520 --> 00:55:41,512
This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

633
00:55:44,025 --> 00:55:46,186
Turn.

634
00:55:47,529 --> 00:55:50,293
You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

635
00:55:50,365 --> 00:55:54,699
- Right? Huh?
- [ Crow Cawing ]

636
00:55:56,271 --> 00:55:58,739
[ Groans ]
Damn! Dead end!

637
00:55:58,807 --> 00:56:01,037
[ Cawing ]

638
00:56:04,145 --> 00:56:06,613
- [ Man ] Look out!
- [ Woman Screams ]

639
00:56:09,918 --> 00:56:12,148
Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

640
00:56:23,231 --> 00:56:27,497
- [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

641
00:56:27,569 --> 00:56:31,096
[ Siren Wailing ]

642
00:56:31,172 --> 00:56:33,640
Shit! Shit!

643
00:56:40,782 --> 00:56:44,479
Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

644
00:56:45,920 --> 00:56:49,378
T-bird!
l got you, man!

645
00:56:49,457 --> 00:56:51,857
- Shit!
- [ Screaming ]

646
00:56:55,630 --> 00:57:00,658
[ Groaning, Car Door Chiming ]

647
00:57:05,240 --> 00:57:07,538
[ T-bird ] Remember?
Yeah, l remember everything.

648
00:57:07,609 --> 00:57:10,840
But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

649
00:57:10,912 --> 00:57:13,676
What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

650
00:57:13,748 --> 00:57:16,842
You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

651
00:57:16,918 --> 00:57:19,079
We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

652
00:57:19,153 --> 00:57:22,418
She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

653
00:57:22,490 --> 00:57:26,085
And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

654
00:57:26,160 --> 00:57:29,596
into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

655
00:57:29,664 --> 00:57:32,929
lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

656
00:57:33,001 --> 00:57:37,904
What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

657
00:57:39,507 --> 00:57:41,372
Did you send us
these complaints?

658
00:57:43,077 --> 00:57:46,410
Come here!
''Abashed the devil stood.''

659
00:57:46,481 --> 00:57:48,847
Does it get you sweaty?

660
00:57:48,917 --> 00:57:54,116
l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

661
00:57:54,188 --> 00:57:58,279
l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

662
00:57:58,412 --> 00:58:02,371
You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

663
00:58:02,450 --> 00:58:05,886
This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

664
00:58:05,953 --> 00:58:08,319
We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

665
00:58:08,389 --> 00:58:12,849
[ Grunting, Muttering ]
T-bird--

666
00:58:12,927 --> 00:58:15,896
There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!

667
00:58:18,466 --> 00:58:22,630
- T-bird.
- [ T-bird Panting ]

668
00:58:22,703 --> 00:58:26,070
- [ Engine Revs ]
- ''Abashed the devil stood...

669
00:58:26,140 --> 00:58:29,075
and felt how awful goodness is.''

670
00:58:29,143 --> 00:58:32,044
''And felt how awful goodness is.''

671
00:58:36,784 --> 00:58:40,777
[ Tires Squealing ]

672
00:58:46,093 --> 00:58:48,687
[ Gasping ]
T-bird. T-bird.

673
00:59:16,424 --> 00:59:19,723
[ Crow Caws ]

674
00:59:39,046 --> 00:59:41,344
[ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

675
00:59:41,415 --> 00:59:43,747
For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

676
00:59:43,818 --> 00:59:48,187
has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

677
00:59:48,255 --> 00:59:51,691
the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

678
00:59:51,759 --> 00:59:57,129
Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

679
00:59:57,198 --> 01:00:02,363
Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

680
01:00:02,436 --> 01:00:06,065
The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

681
01:00:06,140 --> 01:00:09,940
Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

682
01:00:11,979 --> 01:00:14,709
What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

683
01:00:14,782 --> 01:00:19,719
- Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

684
01:00:19,787 --> 01:00:23,917
So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

685
01:00:23,991 --> 01:00:27,324
So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

686
01:00:27,395 --> 01:00:32,492
Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

687
01:00:32,566 --> 01:00:38,334
- Who?
- Oh, it was nuts.

688
01:00:38,406 --> 01:00:43,639
You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

689
01:00:46,147 --> 01:00:50,447
Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

690
01:00:50,518 --> 01:00:52,713
Over easy.

691
01:00:54,822 --> 01:00:59,521
l like 'em
over easy... Mom.

692
01:01:10,104 --> 01:01:12,368
Hey, Albrecht.

693
01:01:12,440 --> 01:01:15,034
[ Sighs ]

694
01:01:15,109 --> 01:01:18,044
This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

695
01:01:18,112 --> 01:01:21,377
We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

696
01:01:21,449 --> 01:01:25,681
- We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

697
01:01:25,753 --> 01:01:27,687
Arson was his specialty.

698
01:01:27,755 --> 01:01:29,723
Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

699
01:01:29,790 --> 01:01:33,726
- Case closed.
- Bull-fuckin'-shit.

700
01:01:33,794 --> 01:01:36,058
Come here.

701
01:01:39,800 --> 01:01:41,791
You're holding out on me.

702
01:01:41,869 --> 01:01:45,396
l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

703
01:01:45,473 --> 01:01:48,738
and you're covering up
for somebody.

704
01:01:48,809 --> 01:01:51,243
Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

705
01:01:51,312 --> 01:01:55,214
- You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

706
01:01:55,282 --> 01:01:57,409
Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

707
01:01:57,485 --> 01:02:00,352
who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

708
01:02:00,421 --> 01:02:03,390
Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

709
01:02:03,457 --> 01:02:05,391
and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

710
01:02:05,459 --> 01:02:07,757
- Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

711
01:02:07,828 --> 01:02:09,853
l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.

712
01:02:09,930 --> 01:02:11,898
You gotta write that shit down.

713
01:02:11,966 --> 01:02:13,900
All right, smart-ass.

714
01:02:13,968 --> 01:02:17,028
The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

715
01:02:17,104 --> 01:02:21,040
- Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

716
01:02:21,108 --> 01:02:24,839
- For what?
- Misconduct.

717
01:02:24,912 --> 01:02:28,939
[ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

718
01:02:29,016 --> 01:02:33,612
[ Thunder Rumbling ]

719
01:02:43,864 --> 01:02:45,798
[ Grunting ]

720
01:03:11,992 --> 01:03:15,894
** [ Electric Guitar ]

721
01:03:19,667 --> 01:03:22,261
[ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

722
01:03:22,336 --> 01:03:25,169
- Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

723
01:03:30,211 --> 01:03:34,011
Dancing--

724
01:03:44,258 --> 01:03:46,988
[ Paper Ripping ]

725
01:04:05,145 --> 01:04:07,079
Eric?

726
01:04:07,147 --> 01:04:09,741
[ Rain Falling ]

727
01:04:09,817 --> 01:04:14,083
[ Sighs ] Man, Sarah,
you're going crazy.

728
01:04:14,154 --> 01:04:17,089
- Gabriel.
- [ Meows ]

729
01:04:17,157 --> 01:04:19,921
l thought you were dead.

730
01:04:19,994 --> 01:04:23,259
You're not dead, are you?

731
01:04:48,022 --> 01:04:50,957
l knew it was you.

732
01:04:52,860 --> 01:04:55,795
Even with the makeup.

733
01:05:00,634 --> 01:05:03,228
l remembered your song.

734
01:05:03,304 --> 01:05:07,070
You said,
''Can't rain all the time.''

735
01:05:07,141 --> 01:05:10,406
That is from your song, right?

736
01:05:20,321 --> 01:05:23,449
- [ Cawing ]
- Come on, Eric. l know you're here.

737
01:05:25,826 --> 01:05:29,922
l miss you...
and Shelly.

738
01:05:33,000 --> 01:05:36,436
Get so lonely
all by myself.

739
01:05:38,305 --> 01:05:42,935
The hell with you.
l thought you cared.

740
01:05:43,010 --> 01:05:46,138
Sarah, l do care.

741
01:05:57,346 --> 01:05:59,473
That's him.
That's him!

742
01:05:59,549 --> 01:06:02,882
But he looked different. He was painted
up white like some kind of dead whore.

743
01:06:02,952 --> 01:06:06,217
l seen him. T-bird sent me in
for some road beers, right?

744
01:06:06,289 --> 01:06:08,849
Then he took him away.
But l chased him down.

745
01:06:08,925 --> 01:06:11,723
And he flash fried T-bird
to his fuckin' car!

746
01:06:11,794 --> 01:06:15,321
Aw, T-bird!
Here's to you, buddy.

747
01:06:15,398 --> 01:06:19,334
Maybe we oughta just videotape this.
Play it back in slow motion.

748
01:06:20,636 --> 01:06:25,232
- Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

749
01:06:25,308 --> 01:06:27,902
- Empty.
- Fire it--

750
01:06:27,977 --> 01:06:29,911
Grave?
What grave?

751
01:06:29,979 --> 01:06:32,209
What about
my fuckin' grave?

752
01:06:32,281 --> 01:06:33,612
- [ Screams ]
- Three out of four.

753
01:06:33,683 --> 01:06:36,948
He's working his way back
to this speed freak right here.

754
01:06:37,019 --> 01:06:39,681
lt's not fair.
lt's Funboy's fault.

755
01:06:39,755 --> 01:06:42,918
That boy was out of control.
T-bird, he came in, he says...
[ Whistles ]

756
01:06:42,992 --> 01:06:46,291
...''Waste them both.'' And now
this ghost gonna kill my ass next!

757
01:06:46,362 --> 01:06:50,264
[ Groaning ]

758
01:06:50,333 --> 01:06:53,427
This ghost gonna
kill my ass next.

759
01:06:53,503 --> 01:06:57,269
- This ghost gonna kill--
- Hey.

760
01:06:57,340 --> 01:06:59,308
That ain't no ghost.

761
01:07:01,210 --> 01:07:04,373
- They have all arrived.
- Watch him.

762
01:07:04,447 --> 01:07:06,438
We might need him.

763
01:07:07,950 --> 01:07:10,384
Ghost gonna kill my--

764
01:07:23,132 --> 01:07:27,068
He like his plain
or with onions?

765
01:07:27,136 --> 01:07:30,572
Fine.
Don't talk to me.

766
01:07:30,640 --> 01:07:34,736
When someone's dead,
they can't come back, can they?

767
01:07:34,810 --> 01:07:37,404
That's what l thought.

768
01:07:37,480 --> 01:07:40,244
Are you referring
to anyone in particular?

769
01:07:40,316 --> 01:07:42,580
You'll just think
l'm nuts.

770
01:07:42,652 --> 01:07:46,247
Yeah, well, then maybe
they'll have to lock us both up.

771
01:07:46,322 --> 01:07:51,692
- You see him too?
- l saw somebody.

772
01:07:51,761 --> 01:07:55,253
Maybe it was
your fairy godfather.

773
01:07:55,331 --> 01:07:58,266
Eric didn't come back for me.

774
01:07:58,334 --> 01:08:03,101
He can't be my friend anymore
because l'm alive.

775
01:08:03,172 --> 01:08:06,369
You want a friend
to walk you home?

776
01:08:06,442 --> 01:08:11,675
** [ Electric Guitar ]

777
01:08:36,872 --> 01:08:39,864
- [ Screaming ]
- * l am the wicked
l am the wave of the future *

778
01:08:52,955 --> 01:08:54,889
[ Woman ] * Being crucified *

779
01:08:54,957 --> 01:08:59,257
* You things, things
things of the flesh *

780
01:08:59,328 --> 01:09:02,024
* Do it slow *

781
01:09:02,098 --> 01:09:06,398
* Down avenues ''cut me'' *

782
01:09:06,469 --> 01:09:10,166
* Lust my eyes *

783
01:09:10,239 --> 01:09:16,508
* Licking lips encouraging
Mr. Careworn *

784
01:09:16,579 --> 01:09:22,711
* To gaze upon the screen bask on *

785
01:09:22,785 --> 01:09:24,810
* After the flesh **

786
01:09:36,799 --> 01:09:40,394
[ Whimpering ]

787
01:09:40,469 --> 01:09:43,404
Boys.

788
01:09:43,472 --> 01:09:46,908
lt seems our friend T-bird won't be
joining us this evening...

789
01:09:46,976 --> 01:09:49,069
on account of
a slight case of death.

790
01:09:49,145 --> 01:09:51,113
- [ Men Chuckling ]
- You wanna sit down?

791
01:09:51,180 --> 01:09:56,550
- [ Groaning ]
- Well, well, well.

792
01:09:56,619 --> 01:09:59,679
Devil's Night is
upon us again.

793
01:09:59,755 --> 01:10:01,689
l thought we'd throw
a little party...

794
01:10:01,757 --> 01:10:05,022
start a bunch of fires,
make a little profit.

795
01:10:05,094 --> 01:10:07,324
l like the pretty lights.

796
01:10:07,396 --> 01:10:10,263
[ Laughing ]

797
01:10:10,332 --> 01:10:14,234
Problem is, it's all been done before.
You see what l'm saying?

798
01:10:14,303 --> 01:10:19,502
- That's no reason to quit.
- Wrong. Best reason to quit.

799
01:10:19,575 --> 01:10:21,975
Only reason to quit.

800
01:10:22,044 --> 01:10:27,539
A man has an idea.

801
01:10:27,616 --> 01:10:29,880
The idea attracts others...

802
01:10:29,952 --> 01:10:32,045
like-minded.

803
01:10:32,121 --> 01:10:34,214
The idea expands.

804
01:10:34,290 --> 01:10:37,953
The idea becomes
an institution.

805
01:10:38,027 --> 01:10:40,689
What was the idea?

806
01:10:40,763 --> 01:10:44,529
See, that's what's
been bothering me, boys.

807
01:10:44,600 --> 01:10:47,398
But l'll tell ya, when l used
to think about the idea itself...

808
01:10:47,470 --> 01:10:50,564
it'd put a big old smile on my face.

809
01:10:50,639 --> 01:10:52,834
You see, gentlemen...

810
01:10:52,908 --> 01:10:57,902
greed is for amateurs.

811
01:10:57,980 --> 01:11:03,179
Disorder, chaos, anarchy...

812
01:11:03,252 --> 01:11:05,846
now that's fun!

813
01:11:05,921 --> 01:11:08,219
- What about Devil's Night?
- What about it?

814
01:11:08,290 --> 01:11:11,691
l started the first fires
in this goddamn city.

815
01:11:11,761 --> 01:11:14,855
Before l knew it, every charlatan
and shitheel was imitating me.

816
01:11:14,930 --> 01:11:18,366
Do you know
what they got now?

817
01:11:18,434 --> 01:11:22,700
Devil's Night greeting cards.

818
01:11:22,772 --> 01:11:25,707
lsn't that precious?

819
01:11:25,775 --> 01:11:27,868
Yeah.

820
01:11:27,943 --> 01:11:32,710
The idea has become
the institution, boys.

821
01:11:32,782 --> 01:11:34,807
Time to move along.

822
01:11:34,884 --> 01:11:37,318
You don't want us to do
''Light My Fire'' time for the whole city?

823
01:11:37,386 --> 01:11:39,877
No.

824
01:11:39,955 --> 01:11:42,549
No, l want you to set
a fire so goddamn big...

825
01:11:42,625 --> 01:11:45,719
the gods will notice us again.
That's what l'm saying.

826
01:11:45,795 --> 01:11:48,389
l want all of you boys to be able
to look me straight in the eye...

827
01:11:48,464 --> 01:11:52,901
one more time and say,
''Are we having fun or what?''

828
01:11:52,968 --> 01:11:55,061
- Hey, you! What's your name?
- Huh?

829
01:11:55,137 --> 01:11:57,071
Skank!
You don't feel that?

830
01:11:57,139 --> 01:12:00,438
- l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.
- [ All Laughing ]

831
01:12:00,509 --> 01:12:02,909
''l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.''

832
01:12:02,978 --> 01:12:07,381
Well, boy, your mama
must be damn proud of you!

833
01:12:07,449 --> 01:12:09,781
- [ Crow Caws ]
- [ Gasps ]

834
01:12:09,852 --> 01:12:12,480
How the hell did
that thing get in here?

835
01:12:13,877 --> 01:12:16,368
- Gentlemen.
- [ Skank Screams ]

836
01:12:16,447 --> 01:12:21,077
[ Skank Whimpering ] Let me go!
Let me go! l gotta go!

837
01:12:25,656 --> 01:12:29,422
You're him, huh?
The avenger.

838
01:12:29,493 --> 01:12:31,984
The killer of killers.

839
01:12:32,062 --> 01:12:34,895
- Nice outfit.
- [ Whimpering ]

840
01:12:34,965 --> 01:12:37,024
l'm not sure
about the face though.

841
01:12:37,101 --> 01:12:39,160
l just want him.

842
01:12:39,236 --> 01:12:42,672
- [ Whimpering ]
- Well, you can't have him.

843
01:12:42,740 --> 01:12:45,402
Well...

844
01:12:47,478 --> 01:12:49,946
l see you have
made your decision.

845
01:12:51,515 --> 01:12:53,506
Now let's see you enforce it.

846
01:12:53,584 --> 01:12:57,247
Aw, this is already boring the shit
out of me. Kill him!

847
01:13:03,127 --> 01:13:07,063
Ooh, that had to hurt.

848
01:13:07,131 --> 01:13:09,929
- [ All Laughing ]
- Well, that's that.

849
01:13:10,000 --> 01:13:13,163
- [ Laughing Continues ]
- That guy was crazy.

850
01:13:15,506 --> 01:13:18,339
[ Caws ]

851
01:13:19,810 --> 01:13:21,607
He's gone.
[ Screams ]

852
01:13:21,678 --> 01:13:27,344
[ Screaming, Gunfire ]

853
01:13:29,653 --> 01:13:31,348
Get him!

854
01:13:36,827 --> 01:13:40,263
- [ Whimpering ]
- [ Gunfire ]

855
01:13:48,639 --> 01:13:51,403
Right here! Here, help me!
He's gonna kill me!

856
01:13:55,479 --> 01:13:57,470
Jesus Christ!

857
01:14:13,897 --> 01:14:15,865
Hey!

858
01:14:48,365 --> 01:14:50,697
You're all going to die.

859
01:15:02,112 --> 01:15:05,639
[ Screaming ]

860
01:15:05,716 --> 01:15:08,549
[ Man ] Get the fuck outta here!

861
01:15:20,831 --> 01:15:23,391
[ Crowd Screaming ]

862
01:15:23,467 --> 01:15:28,962
[ Whimpering, Gasping ]

863
01:15:33,577 --> 01:15:38,537
[ Whimpering ]

864
01:15:38,615 --> 01:15:40,105
[ Screams ]

865
01:15:44,321 --> 01:15:47,256
Guess it's not a good day
to be a bad guy, huh, Skank?

866
01:15:47,324 --> 01:15:50,555
l'm not Skank.
There's Skank right there.

867
01:15:50,627 --> 01:15:54,529
- Skank's dead.
- That's right.

868
01:15:54,598 --> 01:15:56,395
[ Screaming ] No!

869
01:15:56,466 --> 01:16:00,926
[ Whimpering ]

870
01:16:01,004 --> 01:16:04,667
- [ Body Crashing ]
- What in the crap--

871
01:16:06,009 --> 01:16:08,637
- Don't move!
- Hold it!

872
01:16:08,712 --> 01:16:12,148
That's all she wrote!
Move and we shoot!

873
01:16:19,022 --> 01:16:21,183
[ Siren Blaring ]

874
01:16:21,258 --> 01:16:24,125
You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

875
01:16:24,194 --> 01:16:27,493
[ Gunfire Continues ]

876
01:16:27,564 --> 01:16:31,193
- Stop running immediately.
- Holy shit!

877
01:16:31,268 --> 01:16:33,395
...arms and legs--

878
01:16:38,976 --> 01:16:43,743
Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs--

879
01:17:24,388 --> 01:17:29,018
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Come on! Move it!

880
01:17:33,430 --> 01:17:36,558
My advice:
Next time duck.

881
01:17:38,602 --> 01:17:40,968
So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away donuts.

882
01:17:41,038 --> 01:17:44,371
- [ Sirens Wailing ]
- [ Brakes Screeching ]

883
01:17:44,441 --> 01:17:47,535
- Shit!
- [ Door Opening ]

884
01:17:50,447 --> 01:17:53,348
Oh. l knew you
were gonna do that.

885
01:17:53,417 --> 01:17:55,885
Look at that out there.

886
01:17:55,952 --> 01:17:58,887
The whole city oughta be
in flames by now.

887
01:17:58,955 --> 01:18:02,152
Sky oughta be red.

888
01:18:02,225 --> 01:18:06,559
So that, l take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

889
01:18:06,630 --> 01:18:12,330
He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

890
01:18:12,402 --> 01:18:15,371
- l like him already.
- The crow...

891
01:18:15,439 --> 01:18:19,933
is his link between
the land of the living...

892
01:18:20,010 --> 01:18:22,342
and the realm of the dead.

893
01:18:22,412 --> 01:18:26,940
So, kill the crow
and destroy the man.

894
01:18:27,017 --> 01:18:28,985
Hmm.

895
01:18:52,109 --> 01:18:54,100
l'm coming home, Shelly.

896
01:18:54,177 --> 01:18:56,372
[ Laughing ]

897
01:18:56,446 --> 01:19:02,146
[ Laughing Continues ]

898
01:19:02,219 --> 01:19:04,187
[ Chuckles ]

899
01:19:08,458 --> 01:19:12,656
[ Children Laughing, Hooting ]

900
01:19:12,729 --> 01:19:16,995
[ Laughing ]

901
01:19:43,193 --> 01:19:45,627
You're gonna say
l shouldn't be in the cemetery...

902
01:19:45,695 --> 01:19:47,754
in the middle
of the night, right?

903
01:19:47,831 --> 01:19:49,594
Safest place in the world to be.

904
01:19:49,666 --> 01:19:54,433
lt's 'cause everybody's dead.
l knew you'd come here.

905
01:19:54,504 --> 01:19:58,668
lt's really late, Sarah.

906
01:19:58,742 --> 01:20:01,504
You didn't say good-bye.

907
01:20:01,637 --> 01:20:05,596
You're just gonna have
to forgive me for that.

908
01:20:05,675 --> 01:20:09,907
And you're never coming back.

909
01:20:16,219 --> 01:20:19,450
l gave this to Shelly once.

910
01:20:23,192 --> 01:20:26,127
l think she'd like you
to have it.

911
01:20:30,199 --> 01:20:32,463
This way you'll
always remember her.

912
01:20:32,535 --> 01:20:35,095
l'll never take it off.

913
01:20:53,256 --> 01:20:57,090
l better go sneak
back in the house.

914
01:21:03,199 --> 01:21:05,167
Bye.

915
01:21:25,154 --> 01:21:27,987
- [ Muffled Screaming ]
- Shh! Shh!

916
01:21:29,892 --> 01:21:32,292
Shh. Take it easy, sweetheart.

917
01:21:32,361 --> 01:21:37,162
[ Muffled Screaming Continues ]

918
01:21:39,235 --> 01:21:41,703
Come on.
Come on.

919
01:21:54,984 --> 01:21:59,114
What is that? Some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

920
01:22:00,723 --> 01:22:03,817
l'll just keep it for good luck.
What do you say, hmm?

921
01:22:10,266 --> 01:22:13,565
Her eyes are so innocent.

922
01:22:24,914 --> 01:22:26,848
- [ Sarah ] Eric!
- [ Caws ]

923
01:22:26,916 --> 01:22:30,875
Eric, help! Eric!

924
01:22:34,457 --> 01:22:37,551
[ Thunderclap ]

925
01:22:39,595 --> 01:22:41,529
[ Crow Caws ]

926
01:22:55,478 --> 01:22:57,673
[ Crow Flapping, Caws ]

927
01:23:10,293 --> 01:23:13,524
Quick impression for ya.

928
01:23:13,596 --> 01:23:17,327
Caw! Caw! Bang!
Fuck, l'm dead!

929
01:23:17,400 --> 01:23:20,733
Give me the girl
and l'll let you walk out of here.

930
01:23:20,803 --> 01:23:23,863
[ lnhales ]
Well, well.

931
01:23:23,940 --> 01:23:27,706
Why don't you just give me a minute
to think about that, huh?

932
01:23:32,148 --> 01:23:34,582
[ Cawing ]

933
01:23:35,651 --> 01:23:37,949
Nah. Fuck it.

934
01:23:43,960 --> 01:23:46,326
[ Chuckles ]

935
01:23:46,395 --> 01:23:48,556
Aw, fuck.

936
01:23:51,767 --> 01:23:55,726
[ Muffled Screaming ]

937
01:23:55,805 --> 01:24:00,333
Well, well, well. lt does seem to me
that our little life has undergone...

938
01:24:00,409 --> 01:24:04,277
a rather significant change in the past
few minutes now. Wouldn't you agree?

939
01:24:04,347 --> 01:24:08,511
[ Groaning ]

940
01:24:08,584 --> 01:24:11,985
Well, for a ghost,
you bleed just fine.

941
01:24:15,524 --> 01:24:17,788
- lt's still alive.
- Well, then kill it!

942
01:24:19,428 --> 01:24:21,658
Bye-bye, birdie.

943
01:25:06,742 --> 01:25:08,835
Ah, shit.

944
01:25:08,911 --> 01:25:11,004
Well, just came by
to pay my respects...

945
01:25:11,080 --> 01:25:13,105
and here you are
getting all shot up again.

946
01:25:13,182 --> 01:25:15,776
- They've taken Sarah.
- How many?

947
01:25:15,851 --> 01:25:17,842
Two more.
[ Groans ]

948
01:25:17,920 --> 01:25:19,911
l can handle it.
Don't worry.

949
01:25:19,989 --> 01:25:22,514
l'm not worried.
Look, here's the plan.

950
01:25:22,591 --> 01:25:25,355
You stay in front, and when they
run out of ammo, l'll arrest 'em.

951
01:25:25,428 --> 01:25:29,159
That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

952
01:25:31,767 --> 01:25:35,328
Oh, shit.
You're bleeding all over the place.

953
01:25:35,404 --> 01:25:37,463
l thought, you know,
you were invincible.

954
01:25:37,540 --> 01:25:40,998
l was.
l'm not anymore.

955
01:25:41,077 --> 01:25:45,309
[ Sighs ] Well, l guess you really will
need my help, won't you?

956
01:25:45,381 --> 01:25:48,282
- Come on.
- [ Groaning ]

957
01:25:50,953 --> 01:25:53,012
You take that.

958
01:26:23,085 --> 01:26:26,543
- You were supposed to stay behind me.
- l think l messed up.

959
01:26:48,677 --> 01:26:50,577
[ Crow Caws ]

960
01:26:50,646 --> 01:26:53,877
This is all the power
you ever had.

961
01:26:53,949 --> 01:26:56,042
Now it is mine.

962
01:26:56,118 --> 01:26:59,815
Pity there's not more time...

963
01:26:59,889 --> 01:27:02,517
- [ Gun Cocks ]
- ...for us.

964
01:27:03,959 --> 01:27:09,693
[ Woman Screaming ]

965
01:27:11,367 --> 01:27:15,303
[ Screaming ]

966
01:27:16,605 --> 01:27:20,564
[ Screaming Continues ]

967
01:27:20,643 --> 01:27:23,510
[ Sarah ] Help, Eric!
l'm scared!

968
01:27:25,614 --> 01:27:28,174
Let me go!

969
01:27:37,259 --> 01:27:40,786
Let her go!

970
01:27:40,863 --> 01:27:43,768
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

971
01:27:43,768 --> 01:27:45,463
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

972
01:27:45,536 --> 01:27:47,527
All right.

973
01:27:47,605 --> 01:27:49,630
- [ Sarah Screams ]
- No!

974
01:27:53,444 --> 01:27:58,780
[ Gasping, Groaning ]

975
01:28:01,052 --> 01:28:03,111
[ Crow Caws ]

976
01:28:03,187 --> 01:28:05,553
[ Thunderclap ]

977
01:28:05,623 --> 01:28:07,955
[ Gasping ]

978
01:28:08,026 --> 01:28:10,153
- [ Thunderclap ]
- [ Screams ]

979

987
01:29:19,363 --> 01:29:21,524

till you find him.''

988
01:29:21,599 --> 01:29:24,124
What happened back there

989

l cleared that building.

990
01:29:27,205 --> 01:29:30,470
Hell, nothing in this town
happens without my say-so.

991
01:29:30,541 --> 01:29:33,408

your wedding plans, friend.

992
01:29:33,478 --> 01:29:36,311
But if it's any consolation
to you...

993
01:29:36,380 --> 01:29:40,009
you have put
a smile on my face.

994
01:29:40,084 --> 01:29:42,712
You got a lot
of spirit, son.

995
01:29:42,787 --> 01:29:45,381
[ Unsheathes Knife ]
l am going to miss you.

996
01:29:45,456 --> 01:29:47,981

to give you.

997
01:29:48,059 --> 01:29:50,459

998
01:29:54,932 --> 01:29:57,958

999
01:30:00,304 --> 01:30:03,000

- [ Groaning ]

01:30:19,924 --> 01:30:23,360

1003

1004
01:30:47,885 --> 01:30:50,149

1005
01:30:52,156 --> 01:30:56,149

God, l need a cigarette.

1006

1007

1008
01:31:06,504 --> 01:31:09,064
What you kept in here
saved me.

1009
01:31:09,140 --> 01:31:12,268

- Don't mention it.

1010
01:31:12,343 --> 01:31:15,335
l've been meaning
to come to church anyway.

1011

Oh, yuck.
[ Spits ]

1012
01:31:23,187 --> 01:31:28,181
l'm quitting as of now...

1013

until help comes.

1014
01:31:40,171 --> 01:31:43,629
He'll be okay, right?

1015
01:31:43,708 --> 01:31:45,903
Eric?

1016
